Translations.Text: Ni shuo:`Wo ceng feng dao qishi: You ji ge jingling yi jing jing ting, bingqie shuo:“Women que yi tingjian qiyi de “gulanjing”,
ta neng dao ren yu zhengdao, gu women xinyang ta, women jue bu yi renhe wu pei women de zhu.
Zansong women de zhu de zunyan! Chaojue wanwu, ta meiyou ze qu qi shi, ye meiyou ze qu ernu.
Women zhong de yong yu, chang yi beimiu de shi wumie zhenzhu,
women ceng caixiang ren he jingling jue bu wumie zhenzhu.
Ceng you yixie nanren, qiu xie nan jingling baohu tamen, yin'er shi tamen gengjia jiao'ao.
Naxie nanren ceng xiang nimen yiyang caixiang zhenzhu jue bu shi renhe sizhe fuhuo.'
`Women ceng shitan tian, faxian tianshang bu man jianqiang de weishi he canlan de xingsu.
Guoqu, women wei qieting er changchang zuo zai tianshang ke zuo di difang. Xianzai shui qu qieting, shui jiu faxian yi ke canlan de xingsu zai dengzhe ta.
Women bu zhidao, jiujing shi da dishang de wanwu jiang zao huannan ne? Haishi tamen de zhu yu yin tamen yu zhengdao ne?
Women zhong you shanliang de, you ci yu shanliang de, women shi fen wei xuduo paibie de.
Women xiangxin, women zai da dishang, jue buneng shi zhenzhu wunai, ye jue buneng taobi zhenzhu de qianze.
Dang women tingjian zhengdao de shihou, women yi xinyang ta. Shui xinyang zhu, shui bupa kekou, ye bupa shouru.
